channel.title: Go from flying to standing

item.title: Go from flying to standing
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

How do I go from the flying command to standing normally on the ground?
Here’s my code for flying…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fly") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("playername")) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; sendMessage("I'm Flying! Weeee!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 10:15:02 PM[/size][hr]Any help, from anyone, please? Any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2008, 01:59:34 AM[/size][hr]Does anyone know the walking animation number?

Since I know the flying animation is 1851, and the levitation animation is 1500 what is the normal standing still animation? (if I knew that I could make this code to make the person land on the ground)

Read full topic
